text: The Elmira Colonels (also known as the Rosies) were an American basketball team based in Elmira, New York that was a member of the American Basketball League. It is, to date, the only major league sports team to have ever resided in the Southern Tier. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. Season !Playoffs |- |1951/52 |ABL |2nd |Did not qualify |- |1952/53 |ABL |3rd |Playoffs |} Category:Basketball teams in New York (state) Category:Defunct basketball teams in the United States Category:Elmira, New York Category:Defunct baseball teams in New York (state)
title: Elmira Colonels
